name: provider
description: Description: The name of the identity provider.

name: provider_username
description: Description: The account owner’s username on the identity provider’s service.

name: updated_at
description: Description: When the identity proof was last updated.

name: proof_url
description: Description: A link to a statement of identity proof, hosted by the identity provider.

name: profile_url
description: Description: The account owner’s profile URL on the identity provider.
